North Dakota

Like Sweden; South Dakota never locked down! and with only 21 deaths, their death rate is 24 per million—ONE TENTH the US C19 mortality rate.

Lockdowns don’t work!!!

South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem on Tuesday mapped out a plan for getting the state “back to normal,” amid the coronavirus outbreak, a plan that she said emphasizes personal responsibility instead of government orders.

Later, the Republican governor – who drew criticism from Democrats and others for never issuing a statewide stay-at-home-order – talked about her plan “In South Dakota we didn’t close any businesses. We didn’t do any shelter-in-place.”
